title: Biden Finds Himself Boxed In on China
itunes:title: Biden Finds Himself Boxed In on China
description:
Dr. David Kim, Chief Executive of Physician Enterprise at Providence Health, discusses medical staffing issues created by the pandemic. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News White House Reporter Jenny Leonard share Jenny's Businessweek Magazine story One Year Into His Term, Biden Finds Himself Boxed In on China. Anton Schutz, President at Mendon Capital, breaks down earnings and shares his thoughts on fintech. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Rational Dynamic Brands Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
